markdownRemark.html:
In summer 2021 we had a series of meetings to discuss pending schema changes:

  • PaNOSC Data Model, 10th August 2021
  • Volume and File counts, 11th August 2021
  • Richer Metadata for Users and Scientists, 18th August 2021
  • Sample Entity Changes, 8th September 2021
  • Data Publication Workflows, 9th September 2021
